title: Which is the best feature phone for call recording? - Quora

response.answer_text: Call recording is not much big thing. Android KitKat and all later version has in build call recording features. Just while you call or receive a phone call just tap on menu button you will get call recording option. Open calling apps. Tap on three dots / call setting / enable call recording. There are many free apps available on play store for call recording.
